newsitem.title: USA: U.S. barge rates steady to lower on call session.
newsitem.headline: U.S. barge rates steady to lower on call session.

text.p: U.S. barge rates were mostly steady to lower on Friday on the St. Louis Merchants Exchange call session. No barges traded versus seven barges on Thursday.
- Two barges, next week, Mid-Mississippi, no bid, offered 105 percent, unchanged.
- Two barges, next week, lower Ohio river, bid 85 percent of tariff, offered 90 percent.
- Five barges, one each week of September, Mid-Mississippi, bid 132-1/2 percent, offered 145 percent (two each week).
- Four barges, one each week of October, Mid-Mississippi, bid 215 percent, similar unchanged, offer 220 percent, similar unchanged.
- Eight barges, two each week of October, Illinois river, bid 210 percent (one each week), offered 215 percent, down five percentage points, similar.
